ShortDescription.Value: Fast Bikes and Scooters (adjustable speed + swaying) :)

Publish.LongDescription:
Is your city stuck behind slow bikes?
Fast Bikes speeds up bicycles and electric scooters (or slows them down).
### Features
- Speed multiplier - Uses a smoothing formula for acceleration + braking - Optional sway stability tuning (stiffness/damping) - One-click Reset buttons.
### Tech notes
- Road speed limits and game conditions may still cap speeds. - To make Fast-bikes even better, install "Road Speed Adjuster" mod to change road speeds. - Uncheck Enable to disable the mod without uninstalling. - Safe to remove any time (reset first for the cleanest return to game defaults). - 11 Languages
### Support and Feedback
If the mod helps you, give it a Like :) Report issues on Github link, Forum, or Discord.
### Performant design
- Great effort was made to ensure this runs only when you change mod menu settings, then goes idle. - Does not run per-frame continuously in-city to impact fps :)
